name: Sandbox
description:
The goal of the game is to collect 22 bills. To collect them, you need to press the "play" button and move to the sandbox level.
[center] [/center]
On the level just remove the sand and lower the figure of the girl below, on the rocks (careful, if you touch the top or bottom frame, the level will end).

A new note is obtained only if the girl figure has reached the rocks below.

Inside the bag phone, notepad and water.

In the notebook you can pump traction (manually or auto), glow, the visibility of coins and the value of the level.

Enhancements are bought with coins collected on the level.

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;
